Hello modder,

i start my work with UNITY 4.6.6 and have problems to make animations, shader/emmisive animations.

Downgrade to Version 4.2.2 kill my Project, unfortunatly.

Any helps to made shader-animations and other animations with UNITY 4.6.6?

Thank you

Just a thought...

Have you tried creating in 4.2.2 and then importing to 4.6.6?

I don't know if that will work, but might be worth a try to test.

(I am VERY new to KSP and modding. Feel free to ignore me..)

Aces.

I presume you were following the procedures outlined in this thread for downgrading to 4.2.2?

Unfortunately, Unity 4.3 / 4.6 do not properly support the legacy animation system used by KSP for animated emissives. You will have to recreate your project from scratch in 4.2.2, and do not upgrade to 4.3 / 4.6 afterward.

A user named Fengist will probably insist that Unity 5 is usable, but since you're a newcomer to modding, I'd strongly advise you to avoid using that new version as it is not officially supported.

(ASIDE: There has been no official word on whether KSP 1.1's Unity 5.x update will make use of better methods for emissive animation, so don't hold your breath)
